When creating an identity, does 50% of the fees go to referrers and 50% go to miners or stakers?

No, that's not correct. According to the protocol, 20 VRSC goes to the referrer's ID, 20 VRSC to the referrer's referrer's ID, 20 VRSC to the referrer's referrer's referrer's ID, and 20 VRSC to the miner of the block in which the ID is mined. Additionally, 100% of all funds that are not paid to referrers go to miners or stakers of the blockchain.

- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s referrer’s referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the miner of the block in which the ID is mined100% of all funds that are not paid to referrers go to miners or stakers of the blockchain.## To create an identity:
